      • getRandom

        public byte[] getRandom(int length)
        Get the random data from PED with the length.
        Parameters:
        length - The length of random data to get,the maximum is 524288 (512K).
        Returns:
        returns the random data of special length if success else return null.

      • getOfflinePin

        public void getOfflinePin(KeySystem ks,
                 int slotNo,
                 java.lang.String expectPinLen,
                 IccOfflinePinApdu iccApdu,
                 PinBlockCallback callback)
        To get offline pin with the special parameters.
        Parameters:
        ks - only support KeySystem.ICC_PLAIN or KeySystem.ICC_CIPHER
        slotNo - the slot number of IC card.
        expectPinLen - the expected length for inputting PIN, such as:"0,4,6,7,8,12".
        iccApdu - the IccOfflinePinApdu data.
        callback - the result of callback, refer to PinBlockCallback.onPinBlock(int, byte[])

      • getOfflinePin

        public void getOfflinePin(KeySystem ks,
                 int slotNo,
                 java.lang.String expectPinLen,
                 IccOfflinePinApdu iccApdu,
                 PinKeyInfo[] keyInfos,
                 PinBlockCallback callback,
                 PinKeyInfoCallback keyInfoCallback)
        To get offline pin with the special parameters.
        Parameters:
        ks - only support KeySystem.ICC_PLAIN or KeySystem.ICC_CIPHER
        slotNo - the slot number of IC card.
        expectPinLen - the expected length for inputting PIN, such as:"0,4,6,7,8,12".
        iccApdu - the IccOfflinePinApdu data.
        keyInfos - the PinKeyInfo data
        callback - the result of callback, refer to PinBlockCallback.onPinBlock(int, byte[])
        keyInfoCallback - the result of callback, refer to PinKeyInfoCallback

      • getSensitiveTimer

        public int getSensitiveTimer(int sensitiveType)
        To get the sensitive time of PED.
        Parameters:
        sensitiveType - the sensitive type is one of the belows: TYPE_PIN_INTERVAL,TYPE_UPDATE_INTERVAL,TYPE_ACCOUNT_INTERVAL
        Returns:
        returns the sensitive time of PED.

      • createDukptKey

        public int createDukptKey(int keyIndex,
                 byte[] initKey,
                 byte[] KSN)
        To create DUKPT key in PED.
        Parameters:
        keyIndex - the index of DUKPT key.
        initKey - the initialization key of DUKPT.
        KSN - the KSN data.
        Returns:
        returns 0 if success else failure,please refer to the error code of PedRetCode.

      • createDukptKey

        public int createDukptKey(int cuid,
                 int keyIndex,
                 byte[] initKey,
                 byte[] KSN)
        To create DUKPT key in PED with CUID.
        Parameters:
        cuid - the cuid which the key to create.
        keyIndex - the index of DUKPT key.
        initKey - the initialization key of DUKPT.
        KSN - the data.
        Returns:
        returns 0 if success else failure,please refer to the error code of PedRetCode.

      • dukptDecryptRequest

        public byte[] dukptDecryptRequest(int keyIndex,
                         byte[] data)
        To decrypt the data that encypted by dukptEncryptRequest(int, byte[]).
        Parameters:
        keyIndex - the index of DUKPT key.
        data - the data to be decrypted.
        Returns:
        returns the decrypted data if success else null.

      • dukptDecryptResponse

        public byte[] dukptDecryptResponse(int keyIndex,
                          byte[] data)
        To decrypt the data by DUKPT key.
        Parameters:
        keyIndex - the index of DUKPT key.
        data - the data to be decrypted.
        Returns:
        returns the decrypted data if success else null.

      • dukptCalcMacResponse

        public byte[] dukptCalcMacResponse(int keyIndex,
                          MACMode mode,
                          byte[] data)
        To calculate the MAC of data with DUKPT key.
        Parameters:
        keyIndex - the index of DUKPT key.
        mode - the algorithm Mode of MAC.
        data - the data needs to be calculate.
        Returns:
        returns the MAC data if success else null.

      • dukptVerifyMacResponse

        public boolean dukptVerifyMacResponse(int keyIndex,
                             MACMode mode,
                             byte[] data,
                             byte[] macBlock)
        To verify the MAC with DUKPT key.
        Parameters:
        keyIndex - the index of DUKPT key.
        mode - the algorithm Mode of MAC.
        data - the data needs to be verify.
        macBlock - the MAC Block data
        Returns:
        returns true if verification success else false.

      • dukptVerifyMacResponse

        public boolean dukptVerifyMacResponse(int keyIndex,
                             MACMode mode,
                             byte[] data,
                             byte[] macBlock,
                             byte[] macValMask)
        To verify the MAC with DUKPT key depends on mask.
        Parameters:
        keyIndex - the index of DUKPT key.
        mode - the algorithm Mode of MAC.
        data - the data needs to be verify.
        macBlock - the MAC Block data
        macValMask - the MAC Block to verify depend on macValMask, eg: if you want to verify the first 4 bytes of macBlock, the macValMask is {0xff,0xff,0xff,0xff,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00}
        Returns:
        returns true if verification success else false.

      • writeKey

        public int writeKey(KeySystem ks,
           KeyType keyType,
           int masterKeyIndex,
           int destKeyIndex,
           int mode,
           byte[] key)
        To write the key data that encrypted by master key.
        Parameters:
        ks - the system of key
        keyType - the type of key.
        masterKeyIndex - the index of master key.
        destKeyIndex - the target key index to write.
        mode - the verification mode of key.
        key - the key data to write.
        Returns:
        returns 0 if success else failure,please refer to the error code of PedRetCode.

      • rootWriteKey

        public int rootWriteKey(KeySystem ks,
               KeyType keyType,
               int cuid,
               int masterKeyIndex,
               int destKeyIndex,
               int mode,
               byte[] key)
        To write the key data that encrypted by master key.
        Parameters:
        ks - the system of key
        keyType - the type of key.
        cuid - the cuid which the key to write.
        masterKeyIndex - the index of master key.
        destKeyIndex - the target key index to write.
        mode - the verification mode of key.
        key - the key data to write.
        Returns:
        returns 0 if success else failure,please refer to the error code of PedRetCode.

      • setPinEntryChangeListener

        public void setPinEntryChangeListener(Ped.PinEntryChangeListener listener)
        To set the PIN input changed listener if you want to know the number of PIN input.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener of PIN input.

      • setDisplayAmount

        public void setDisplayAmount(java.lang.String amount)
        Set the amount to be displayed on the PIN input view with the default style.

        Please call the method before invoke getPinBlock(KeySystem, int, PinBlockFormat, String, String, PinBlockCallback) if you want to use the default style.

        Parameters:
        amount - the amount to be displayed.

      • setPinPadView

        public void setPinPadView(PadView view)
        Set the PIN input view with custom style.

        Please call the method before invoke getPinBlock(KeySystem, int, PinBlockFormat, String, String, PinBlockCallback) if you want to use your custom style.

        Parameters:
        view - the pad view to show.

      • setPadViewStyle

        public void setPadViewStyle(android.os.Bundle styleBundle)
        Set the style of PIN input window.
        Parameters:
        styleBundle - the bundle parameter,for example: 
                            ...
                    Bundle bundle = new Bundle();
                    bundle.putBoolean(STYLE_ONLY_SHOW_PIN_INPUT_WIN,true);
                    //It's effective for the default template KeyBoardView as follows:
                    bundle.putString(STYLE_CLEAR_KEY_BG_COLOR,"#F68A30");
                    bundle.putString(STYLE_CANCEL_KEY_BG_COLOR,"#C8442F");
                    bundle.putString(STYLE_ENTER_KEY_BG_COLOR,"#0055C2");
                    bundle.putBoolean(STYLE_CANCEL_KEY_IS_TOP,true);
                    bundle.putInt(FUNC_KEYS_SIDE,FUNC_KEYS_LEFT);
                    bundle.putBoolean(RANDOM_SCALE_LOCATION,true);
                    ..
                    //To set template one of KeyBoardView, you can refer as follow:
                    bundle.putInt(KEYBOARD_VIEW_TEMPLATE,KEYBOARD_VIEW_TEMPLATE_1);
                    bundle.putString(CARD_NO_DISPLAY,"6222********123456");
                    ...
                    Ped.getInstance().setPadViewStyle(bundle);
                    ...

      • getPinBlock

        public void getPinBlock(KeySystem ks,
               int keyIndex,
               PinBlockFormat mode,
               java.lang.String expectPinLen,
               java.lang.String cardNo,
               PinBlockCallback callback)
        To get the PIN Block data with the special parameters.
        Parameters:
        ks - the system of key.
        keyIndex - the index of key.
        mode - the mode of PinBlockFormat.
        expectPinLen - the expected length for inputting PIN, such as:"0,4,6,7,8,12".
        cardNo - the PAN.
        callback - the callback interface of PIN block.

      • getPinBlock

        public void getPinBlock(KeySystem ks,
               int keyIndex,
               PinBlockFormat mode,
               java.lang.String expectPinLen,
               java.lang.String cardNo,
               PinKeyInfo[] keyInfos,
               PinBlockCallback callback,
               PinKeyInfoCallback keyInfoCallback)
        To get the PIN Block data with the special parameters.
        Parameters:
        ks - the system of key.
        keyIndex - the index of key.
        mode - the mode of PinBlockFormat.
        expectPinLen - the expected length for inputting PIN, such as:"0,4,6,7,8,12".
        cardNo - the PAN.
        keyInfos - the PinKeyInfo data
        callback - the callback interface of PIN block.
        keyInfoCallback - the result of callback, refer to PinKeyInfoCallback

      • getMac

        public byte[] getMac(KeySystem ks,
            int keyIndex,
            MACMode mode,
            byte[] data)
        To calculate the MAC block.
        Parameters:
        ks - the system of key.
        keyIndex - the index of key,
        mode - the algorithm of MAC mode.
        data - the data to calculate MAC.
        Returns:
        returns MAC block if success else null.

      • encryptAccount

        public byte[] encryptAccount(KeySystem ks,
                    int keyIndex,
                    int mode,
                    byte[] data)
        To encrypt the account data.
        Parameters:
        ks - the system of key.
        keyIndex - the index of key.
        mode - only supported TDEA_MODE_CBC 或 TDEA_MODE_ECB
        data - the account data to encrypt.
        Returns:
        returns the encrypted data if success else null.

      • injectKey

        public int injectKey(KeySystem ks,
            KeyType keyType,
            int keyIndex,
            byte[] plainTextKey)
        To inject the plaintext data of master key.
        Parameters:
        ks - the system of key.
        keyType - the type of key.
        keyIndex - the index of key.
        plainTextKey - the plaintext key to inject.
        Returns:
        returns 0 if success else failure,please refer to the error code of PedRetCode.

      • rootInjectKey

        public boolean rootInjectKey(KeySystem system,
                    KeyType type,
                    int keyIndex,
                    int CUID,
                    byte[] plaintextKey,
                    byte[] KSN)
        To inject the plaintext data of master key, the application has to the system permission.
        Parameters:
        system - the system of key.
        type - the type of key.
        keyIndex - the index of key.
        CUID - the CUID which key stored
        plaintextKey - the plaintext key to inject.
        KSN - the KSN data if the system is KeySystem.DUKPT_DES else null.
        Returns:
        returns true if success else false.

      • checkKey

        public int checkKey(KeySystem ks,
           KeyType keyType,
           int keyIndex,
           int mode)
        To check the key exist or not in PED.
        Parameters:
        ks - the system of key.
        keyType - the type of key.
        keyIndex - the index of key,
        mode - the mode,it's always be 0 in current.
        Returns:
        returns 0 if success else failure,please refer to the error code of PedRetCode.

      • checkKey

           int cuid,
           int keyIndex,
           int mode)
        To check the key exist or not in PED.
        Parameters:
        ks - the system of key.
        keyType - the type of key.
        cuid - the cuid which the key to stroe.
        keyIndex - the index of key,
        mode - the mode,it's always be 0 in current.
        Returns:
        returns 0 if success else failure,please refer to the error code of PedRetCode.

      • getWorkKeyKCV

        public byte[] getWorkKeyKCV(KeySystem ks,
                   KeyType keyType,
                   int keyIndex)
        Get work key kvc
        Parameters:
        ks - MS_DES, MS_SM4, FIXED_DES, FIXED_SM4, DUKPT_DES
        keyType - KEY_TYPE_PINK, KEY_TYPE_MACK, KEY_TYPE_EAK
        keyIndex - Index of key
        Returns:
        4 bytes kcv if success, null if failed

      • rootGetKeyKCV

        public byte[] rootGetKeyKCV(int cuid,
                   KeySystem ks,
                   KeyType keyType,
                   int keyIndex)
        Get work key kvc by cuid
        Parameters:
        cuid - the CUID
        ks - MS_DES, MS_SM4, FIXED_DES, FIXED_SM4, DUKPT_DES
        keyType - KEY_TYPE_PINK, KEY_TYPE_MACK, KEY_TYPE_EAK
        keyIndex - Index of key
        Returns:
        4 bytes kcv if success, null if failed

      • desDencryptUnified

        public byte[] desDencryptUnified(KeySystem ks,
                        KeyType keyType,
                        int keyIndex,
                        int mode,
                        byte[] IV,
                        byte[] dataIn)
        Choose key to encrypt/decrypt data by DES
        Parameters:
        ks - MS_DES, FIXED_SM4
        keyType - For encrypt KEY_TYPE_MACK, KEY_TYPE_EAK
        keyIndex - Index of key
        mode - (TDEA_ENCRYPT or TDEA_DECRYPT) | (TDEA_MODE_ECB or TDEA_MODE_CBC)
        IV - Initial IV, must be 8 bytes
        dataIn - The data to be decrypted or encrypted.
        Returns:
        Returned null if it is failure else successed.

      • desDencryptUnifiedByCUID

        public byte[] desDencryptUnifiedByCUID(int cuid,
                              KeySystem ks,
                              KeyType keyType,
                              int keyIndex,
                              int mode,
                              byte[] IV,
                              byte[] dataIn)
        Choose key to encrypt/decrypt data by DES
        Parameters:
        cuid - cuid
        ks - MS_DES, FIXED_SM4
        keyType - For encrypt KEY_TYPE_MACK, KEY_TYPE_EAK
        keyIndex - Index of key
        mode - (TDEA_ENCRYPT | (TDEA_MODE_ECB or TDEA_MODE_CBC)
        IV - Initial IV, must be 8 bytes
        dataIn - The data to be decrypted or encrypted.
        Returns:
        Returned null if it is failure else success.

        public byte[] tidSNEncrypt(byte[] randomFactor)
        Encrypt the tid serial number.
        Parameters:
        randomFactor - the random factor.
        Returns:
        returned the encrypted data.

        Set keys sort of the PIN input view random or not.
        Parameters:
        isRandom - true: random; false: not random.
        Returns:

      • cancelInputPin

        public void cancelInputPin()
        To cancel the pin input operation (the same as enter 'CANCEL' key).

      • enterInputPin

        public void enterInputPin()
        To enter the pin input operation (the same as enter 'ENTER' key).

      • importCertData

        public boolean importCertData(int keyIndex,
                     KeyType type,
                     byte[] certData)
        Import the certification data by the key index.
        Parameters:
        keyIndex - the key index.
        type - the key type is KeyType.KEY_TYPE_RSA_CA_CRT or KeyType.KEY_TYPE_RSA_CLIENT_CRT
        certData - the certification data.
        Returns:
        returned true if imported success else false.

      • exportCertData

        public byte[] exportCertData(int keyIndex,
                    KeyType type)
        Export the certification data by key index and key type.
        Parameters:
        keyIndex - the key index
        type - the key type is KeyType.KEY_TYPE_RSA_CA_CRT or KeyType.KEY_TYPE_RSA_CLIENT_CRT
        Returns:
        returned the certification data if success else null.

      • setKeyboardOrientation

        public boolean setKeyboardOrientation(int orientation)
        Set keyboard orientation.
        Parameters:
        orientation - Only support KEYBOARD_ORIENTATION_REVERSE_PORTRAIT
        Returns:
        true if success else false.

      • setPinKeyTones

        public boolean setPinKeyTones(java.lang.String fullKeyToneFilePath,
                     java.lang.String numKeyToneFilePath)
        Set the pin key tones.
        Parameters:
        fullKeyToneFilePath - the file path of the full key tone(Please put it under /data/ums_share)
        numKeyToneFilePath - the file path of the number key tone(Please put it under /data/ums_share)
        Returns:
        return true if success; false if failed.
